description: This indicator provides levels of activity by region in research projects that are semantically similar to the Covid-19 research clusters supported by the Commission. It can be interpreted as a measure of the levels of activity and investment in research areas related to societal preparedness and resilience to crisis with a particular focus on the biomedical domain

value.label: Relative project specialisation in public health research area

subtitle: Relative project specialisation in public health research area
title: Relative specialisation in projects about public health
